author: senior110
post: Enjoy reading this blog, but unfortunately, I don’t have the training/knbowledge nor the HP to fully appreciate this and wish I were 20 years younger with an additional 50 IQ points. May I respectively recommend you peruse some of Sheldrake’s writings. I thought “Conversations with God” was a stretch, Sheldrake’s goes beyond that: he even questions the scientific method as currently practiced. Would appreciate some feedback..
title: LiveScience Goofs Again
